Title: SC directs Unitech to deposit Rs.15 crore
Content: Embattled real estate firm Unitech Ltd. was on Wednesday directed by the Supreme Court to deposit Rs.15 crore principal amount by September-end to pay back investors who had bought flats in its Gurgao
Description: Embattled real estate firm Unitech Ltd. was on Wednesday directed by the Supreme Court to deposit Rs.15 crore principal amount by September-end to pay back investors who had bought flats in its Gurgao
